sources.title: Chipollino
sources.description: Characters of fairy tale are vegetables or fruit: shoemaker Vinogradinka (Grape), the godfather the Pumpkin, the girl the Radish, boy Vishenka (Cherry) etc. The main character a boy-onion Chipollino who struggles against oppressions of poor men from outside rich men - the signor of the Tomato, the prince of the Lemon.
